Poem Title: AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.

line: [Illustration]

Poem Title: AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
line: In great King Arthur's reign, Tom's history first begun;

Poem Title: AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
line: A farmer's wife had sigh'd in vain to have a darling son!

Poem Title: AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
line: A fairy listen'd to her call, and granted her the same;

Poem Title: AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
line: But being very small, Tom Thumb she did him name.

Poem Title: AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
line: [Illustration]

Poem Title: AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
line: To please him every means she'd take,

Poem Title: AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
line: And a pudding large did for him make;

Poem Title: AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
line: But in trying to obtain a sip,

Poem Title: AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
line: Into the batter did he slip!

Poem Title: AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
line: The batter in the pot went plump;

Poem Title: AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
line: Tom made the pudding skip and jump!

Poem Title: AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
line: His mother, with affright, did this espy,

Poem Title: AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
line: And gave it to a tinker passing by;

Poem Title: AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
line: Tom scream'd so loud, that, in dismay,

Poem Title: AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
line: He threw it down, and ran away.

Poem Title: AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
line: [Illustration]

Poem Title: AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
line: Tom to the fields with his mother went,

Poem Title: AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
line: To milk the cow was her intent;

Poem Title: AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
line: The wind blew high as they did walk,

Poem Title: AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
line: So she tied him to a thistle stalk;

Poem Title: AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
line: The cow the thistle view'd and cropp'd,

Poem Title: AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
line: In her mouth, with Tom, it soon was popp'd!

Poem Title: AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
line: Her teeth put Tom in such a fright,

Poem Title: AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
line: That he "mother" bawl'd with all his might!

Poem Title: AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
line: The cow, on hearing such a rout,

Poem Title: AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
line: Open'd her jaws, and Tom step'd out.

Poem Title: AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
line: [Illustration]

Poem Title: AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
line: Our hero great exploits went through;

Poem Title: AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
line: Away with him, once, a raven flew!

Poem Title: AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
line: A giant on him made a dish;

Poem Title: AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
line: He once was swallow'd by a fish!

Poem Title: AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
line: Poor Tom fell sick; when, in a trice,

Poem Title: AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
line: There came a car with flying mice:

Poem Title: AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
line: The queen, inside the car so grand,

Poem Title: AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
line: Convey'd poor Tom to a fairy land.

Poem Title: AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
line: His health restored, she, by her art,

Poem Title: AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
line: In a gale, sent Tom to Arthur's court.

Poem Title: AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
line: [Illustration]

Poem Title: AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
line: King Arthur loved good furmenty,--

Poem Title: AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
line: The cook made a bowl for his majesty;

Poem Title: AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
line: In conveying it to the palace, hot,

Poem Title: AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
line: Our hero into the bowl did drop!

Poem Title: AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
line: The cook was fill'd with great surprise,

Poem Title: AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
line: For the liquor burnt his nose and eyes.

Poem Title: AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
line: The bowl being broke, the angry cook

Poem Title: AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
line: Before the king our hero took:

Poem Title: AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
line: When the king beheld Tom's awful plight,

Poem Title: AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
line: He pardon gave, and dubb'd him knight.

Poem Title: AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
line: [Illustration]

Poem Title: AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
line: Tom, in the palace, lived content;

Poem Title: AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
line: With the king to hunt, on a mouse he went:

Poem Title: AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
line: One day, the mouse a cat espied,

Poem Title: AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
line: And soon to catch him pussey tried;

Poem Title: AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
line: Tom drew his sword, and spoilt her treat,

Poem Title: AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
line: By slaying pussey at his feet.

Poem Title: AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
line: Thus, Tom lived happy--without strife,

Poem Title: AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
line: Till the queen, in anger, sought his life.

Poem Title: AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
line: In the palace he could no longer stay;

Poem Title: AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
line: So on a butterfly he rode away.

Poem Title: AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
line: [Illustration]

Poem Title: AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
line: The butterfly flew from flower to flower;

Poem Title: AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
line: The queen tried to catch it for many an hour;

Poem Title: AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
line: Till at last, oh, direful tale to tell,

Poem Title: AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
line: Into a spider's web our hero fell!

Poem Title: AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
line: The spider ran to seize his prey;

Poem Title: AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
line: Tom, with his sword, fought valiantly;

Poem Title: AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
line: Till, alas! the spider's poisonous breath

Poem Title: AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
line: Was the cause of our gallant hero's death.

Poem Title: AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
line: In a bower of roses his tomb they rear'd,

Poem Title: AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
line: And on it this epitaph appear'd:--

Poem Title: AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
line: [Illustration]

Poem Title: AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
line: Of life deprived, by a spider's bite,

Poem Title: AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
line: Here lies Tom Thumb, a valiant knight:

Poem Title: AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
line: His feasts in Arthur's court, and sight,

Poem Title: AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
line: Fill'd all with wonder and delight.

Poem Title: AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
line: He was bold at tilt and tournament;

Poem Title: AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
line: On a mouse, with the king, the hunt he went:

Poem Title: AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
line: His deeds were great, tho' his size was small,

Poem Title: AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
line: And his death was mourned by one and all.

Poem Title: AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
line: Then, reader, pause; one tear now shed,

Poem Title: AN ENTERTAINING HISTORY OF TOM THUMB.
line: And cry, "Alas! Tom Thumb is dead."
